attributes.action: Make Millwall Football Club play behind closed doors.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please punish millwall FC for there fans and the fact that they cannot control them. They should not be allowed to play infront of a crowd at home and not allowed to take fans away from home. They are a disgrace to football and all the FA and police have worked to eliminate from our football grounds

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
